data.name: 崩坏-RTS honkai-rts
data.detailed_description:
Background plot



In this world, human beings are often hit by honkai, so at the end of the 20th century, human beings established the "huan". It is a giant anti-honkai system covering the whole earth, including a giant ring space station occupying geosynchronous orbit, a human creation composed of fairy law and modern technology.

Coordinated combat system: All forces signed the "Human United Front" Agreement to bridge the gap between the camps and fight together.

In the game, the player will act as the captain and command the Valkyrie to fight against the honkai.

What kind of game is this?



The game is a game produced by the producer for Love Power Generation. It is produced by the Unreal Engine, which is mainly a real-time strategic mode. Of course, there will be other modes in the future.

About Us: Official Communication Group: 511729276。

The relationship between the game and the original?



When the producer plays Collapse III, he may want to create a new world, a new plot, a new gameplay, or a kitchen overflow, or something else. It can be regarded as a two-creation game that collapsed.

What can you play in this game?



You can experience the tension and fun of real-time strategy games in this game. You can fight with other players through the Internet. You can experience the high-quality picture quality and exquisite special effects created by the Unreal Engine. You will experience a new plot different from the original in the future. The producer will seriously think about the player's Needs and recommendations.
About us：511729276
- Two camps: Humans and hokai
- Nine-level honkai energy level division
- The largest fusion device of the Ancient Immortals and modern technology "Huan"

You can feel the beautiful graphics and special effects


The launch screen will display valkyries randomly.





On the deck map you can play against other players.




A shield effect.


The impact of a space-based weapon.





The above is only a small part of the game, more content is still under development, if you have any good suggestions and feedback, or you want to participate in the construction of the game, such as plot building, numerical design and all other game elements. Please express your ideas through the qq group 511729276.

data.short_description: A real-time strategy game based on honkai In the game, you can freely match arms. In this game, you can customize the units to be used. Rich arms matching will bring a lot of play experience. In the game, players will act as captains and command Valkyrie. Fight against honkai.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

data.legal_notice: If the Game is infringing or you do not want to see your legal work in the Game, please contact the author
